comments.body:
@codesue, we should make it as a proper package so cloudpickle_fast can be properly used as well. Seems like v.1.5 was release too .. we should better match it as well.

Let me create a PR by myself to upgrade to 1.5, and co-author you together.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +40,44 @@NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE) ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS
SOFTWARE, EVEN IF ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.
"""
from __future__ import print_function

comments.body: Hey let's dont change this file but keep as the release (and fix their release and port it together). It's the exact copy of cloudpickle release. We just port their fixes and dont have conflicts here for management purpose. Linters skip this file too and we had to put a lot of efforts to resolve the conflicts here before.
I am going to upgrade this file at https://github.com/apache/spark/pull/29114. Seems that release version doesn't have this issue.
ok so since you are upgrading, we are good to leave it as is, correct?  Your merge will fix it up.
Yup, I think we're all good

Thanks for addressing this @HyukjinKwon ! I avoided making changes in other files that I could tell were direct copies (e.g. stuff in `hive-thriftserver`) but did not realize this was one of those cases.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +89,93 @@    PY2_METHOD_WRAPPER_TYPE = type(object.__eq__)
    PY2_CLASS_DICT_SKIP_PICKLE_METHOD_TYPE = (PY2_METHOD_WRAPPER_TYPE,
                                              PY2_WRAPPER_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE)
else:
    types.ClassType = type
